QuestData.Title: Raiding the Vault
QuestData.Description: The Swollen Vault is a repository for some of Lei Shen's nastiest weaponry and most prized trinkets - not surprisingly, these are often one and the same.$B$BOne artifact in particular, an amulet known as the Choker of Storms, could help us to understand his apparent mastery over lightning.$B$BBreak into the vault and slay the hoard-keeper. Take his key and use it to recover the amulet from a cache at the back of the vault.
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal the Choker of Storms from The Swollen Vault.
